payload.content: Agents generate Pull Requests (PRs) faster than human teams can review them.

name: Agents generate Pull Requests (PRs) faster than human teams can review them.
content: Agents generate Pull Requests (PRs) faster than human teams can review them.

payload.content: @cognition has implemented an "autofix" system using @DevinAI where Devin reads incoming review comments from bots on a PR and pushes a fix to the same PR.

name: @cognition has implemented an "autofix" system using @DevinAI where Devin reads
content: @cognition has implemented an "autofix" system using @DevinAI where Devin reads incoming review comments from bots on a PR and pushes a fix to the same PR.

payload.content: The autofix process involves a loop: Devin writes code → a review bot comments → Devin reads the comment → Devin pushes a fix → CI runs again → if something else is flagged, the loop continues.

name: The autofix process involves a loop: Devin writes code → a review bot comments →
content: The autofix process involves a loop: Devin writes code → a review bot comments → Devin reads the comment → Devin pushes a fix → CI runs again → if something else is flagged, the loop continues.

payload.content: The autofix system works with any bot that leaves comments on GitHub PRs, including linters, test runners, security scanners, SonarQube, Codacy, and Devin Review.

name: The autofix system works with any bot that leaves comments on GitHub PRs, includ
content: The autofix system works with any bot that leaves comments on GitHub PRs, including linters, test runners, security scanners, SonarQube, Codacy, and Devin Review.

payload.content: To prevent infinite loops, Devin ignores all bot comments by default, requiring specific bots to be added to an allowlist for processing.

name: To prevent infinite loops, Devin ignores all bot comments by default, requiring
content: To prevent infinite loops, Devin ignores all bot comments by default, requiring specific bots to be added to an allowlist for processing.

payload.content: Lint failure comments are always processed by Devin regardless of allowlist settings because they are common mechanical fixes and least likely to cause loops.

name: Lint failure comments are always processed by Devin regardless of allowlist sett
content: Lint failure comments are always processed by Devin regardless of allowlist settings because they are common mechanical fixes and least likely to cause loops.
